chart.name: data
chart.description: For the use of local data

chart.name: is3d
chart.description: If you set the is3d option to true, your pie chart will be drawn as though it has three dimensions

chartTitle.name: title
chartTitle.description: Title to display above the chart.

chartTitle.name: bold
chartTitle.description: Set true for title in bold font.

chartTitle.name: italic
chartTitle.description: Set true for title text in italic style.

chartLegend.name: position
chartLegend.description: Position of the legend.'bottom' - Below the chart.'top' - Above the chart.

chartLegend.name: alignment
chartLegend.description: Alignment of the legend.'start' - Aligned to the start of the area allocated for the legend.'center' - Centered in the area allocated for the legend 'end' - Aligned to the end of the area allocated for the legend.

chartLegend.name: color
chartLegend.description: Color of chart legend. for example: 'red' or '#00cc00'.

chartLegend.name: bold
chartLegend.description: Set true for legend text in bold font.

chartLegend.name: max-lines
chartLegend.description: Maximum number of lines in the legend. Set this to a number greater than one to add lines to your legend.
